mapper.select: SELECT auth_id, auth_name FROM tb_auth ORDER BY auth_id ASC
SELECT auth_id, auth_name FROM tb_auth WHERE auth_id = #{authId}

SELECT userM.user_name, auth.auth_name, main.* FROM ( SELECT auth_id, user_id FROM tb_user_auth WHERE auth_id = #{authId} ) main LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_auth auth on main.auth_id = auth.auth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user userM on main.user_id = userM.user_id
SELECT user_id , user_name FROM tb_user WHERE user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM tb_user_auth WHERE auth_id = #{authId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_auth (auth_id, auth_name) VALUES (#{authId}, #{authName}) ON CONFLICT (auth_id) DO UPDATE SET auth_id = #{authId}, auth_name = #{authName}
INSERT INTO tb_user_auth (auth_id, user_id) VALUES (#{authId}, #{userId}) ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = #{userId}, auth_id = #{authId}
